lead_paragraph: This film centers on Srinivasa Ramanujan, a brilliant mathematician from India, and his unlikely friendship with the Cambridge professor G.H. Hardy.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘The Man Who Knew Infinity’ Gives a Mathematical Genius His Due
headline.main: Review: ‘The Man Who Knew Infinity’ Gives a Mathematical Genius His Due

snippet: This film centers on Srinivasa Ramanujan, a brilliant mathematician from India, and his unlikely friendship with the Cambridge professor G.H. Hardy.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie The Man Who Knew Infinity, directed by Matthew Brown and starring Dev Patel.
